Concepts.name: Concept
Concepts.description: A concept of some kind

Concepts.name: Expression
Concepts.description: Free form expression

Concepts.name: has up to one
Concepts.description: property pointed to has a cardinality of zero or one with the subject

Concepts.name: has one
Concepts.description: Concept pointed to has a cardinality of one with the subject

Concepts.name: name
Concepts.description: the name of the concept preferrably unambiguous

Concepts.name: description
Concepts.description: the description of the concept to make the meaning unambigous

Concepts.name: code scheme
Concepts.description: The code scheme the concept came from

Concepts.name: CodeScheme
Concepts.description: a source code scheme may be a local scheme or national scheme

Concepts.name: code
Concepts.description: A code which was assigned to the concept in the code scheme

Concepts.name: code prefix
Concepts.description: The code prefix used for generating ID for a particular schema

Concepts.name: is a subtype of
Concepts.description: a property that states that the subject is a subtype of the object

Concepts.name: identifier
Concepts.description: an identifier

Concepts.name: is a descendant of
Concepts.description: An concept that is a descendant of another concept recursively

Concepts.name: a relationships inverse
Concepts.description: the concepts inverse/reciprocal

Concepts.name: has descendants
Concepts.description: Concept has descendants recursively

Concepts.name: relationship
Concepts.description: relationship between one property and another

Concepts.name: Concept property
Concepts.description: a property whose value or target is a concept

Concepts.name: data property
Concepts.description: the property is going to have a simple data type as a value

Concepts.name: Text
Concepts.description: a text value

Concepts.name: Numeric
Concepts.description: a numeric value

Concepts.name: simple data type
Concepts.description: a text or numeric or date value

Concepts.name: Cardinality property
Concepts.description: whether something has zero one or many values for a relationship or attribute

Concepts.name: Cardinality values
Concepts.description: The cardinality of an item

Concepts.name: A property pointing to an object
View
Concepts.description: A configured view of the data model

Concepts.name: A node for a tree containing concept objects
Object
Concepts.description: A property which is an object

Concepts.name: any property
Concepts.description: a reserved property to indicate any property value arrangement can follow from this point

Concepts.name: Date and time
Concepts.description: approximate or exact date and optionally a time

Concepts.name: UUID
Concepts.description: Universal identifier

Concepts.name: less than
Concepts.description: less than the numeric value

Concepts.name: less than or equal
Concepts.description: less than or equal to the numeric value

Concepts.name: greater than
Concepts.description: greater than or the numeric value

Concepts.name: greater than or equal
Concepts.description: greater than or equal to the numeric value

Concepts.name: Comparator
Concepts.description: comparators for a numeric value e.g. less than or greater than

Concepts.name: anonymous
Concepts.description: indicates that this entity is anonymous i.e. has no name and must be identified by properties in a query

Concepts.name: Status
Concepts.description: Indicates the status of this entity

Concepts.name: Concept status
Concepts.description: Concept status values

Concepts.name: Boolean
Concepts.description: A yes/no or true/false value

Concepts.name: Has up to many
Concepts.description: Concept pointed to has a cardinality of zero to many with the subject

Concepts.name: Has value type
Concepts.description: Specifies the value type for this entity

Concepts.name: Codeable concept
Concepts.description: A concept which may be used for coding a health record

Concepts.name: Complex data type
Concepts.description: A complex data type

Concepts.name: Units of measure
Concepts.description: The unit of measure for the associated value

Concepts.name: Relationship
Concepts.description: A concept which may be used for subtyping as relationships

Concepts.name: has parent
Concepts.description: A concept that is the parent of this, representing a hierarchy

Concepts.name: is related to
Concepts.description: A concept that is related (but not equivalent) to

Concepts.name: is equivalent to
Concepts.description: A concept that is exactly equivalent to

Concepts.name: Snomed expression
Concepts.description: An expression in the snomed expression langage

Concepts.name: has synonym
Concepts.description: An alternative name for this concept
